channel.title: Question
channel.description:
ok, i am trying to change the location you are teleported when you die.
i read a tut about it and did what it said but it still teleports people back to varrock when they die.
what i do is go in the client.java and search for youdied. then a little bit down it show the coords of where you should teleport when you die. i put the coords in but it doesnt work. it also sends them to the right place when they die from poison, but not from a player or npc

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

ok, i am trying to change the location you are teleported when you die.

i read a tut about it and did what it said but it still teleports people back to varrock when they die.

what i do is go in the client.java and search for youdied.
then a little bit down it show the coords of where you should teleport when you die.
i put the coords in but it doesnt work.
it also sends them to the right place when they die from poison, but not from a player or npc
